page.title: 12Golspie-Local news editor.
page.content: One of our children interviewed Mr James Henderson,the editor of our local newspaper,the"Northern Times".He told us he had been editor for ten years afer he had arrived from the "Scottish Daily Express" in Glasgow.When asked what was his biggest story,he repliied that it was the severe blizzard which hit the North of Scotland in 1978,causing severe damage and cutting power supplies for up to nine days.Roads were blocked,trains were marooned and for days the only transport operating were helicopters.
